title: Bombardier beetle
data:

==Useful Info==
'''Bombardier beetles''' are insects that can set you [[Sticky Flame|on fire]]. They can be found in the early [[Dungeon]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*They are slow, so it is easy to retreat if you can't fight one yet.
*They are vulnerable to [[poison]], so kiting one around while throwing poisoned darts at a distance is a good way to avoid ever getting hit.
*Moving around will end the fire more quickly.
*Bombardier beetles' Pyre Arrow is a natural ability, so you can't use [[silence]] to prevent them from casting.

==History==
* Bombardier beetles were added in [[0.31]].
